question: Which state has recently announced “Universal Health Coverage” during its budget, with an outlay of Rs.3500 crores?
explanation:
The Chief Minister of Rajasthan Ashok Gehlot has announced during the budget regarding Universal Healthcare scheme in the state with an outlay of Rs.3500 crore.
Under the scheme, every family will get an insurance benefit of Rs.5 lakhs. Those beneficiaries covered under the Ayushman Bharat Mahatma Gandhi Rajasthan Swasthya Bima Yojana can avail this scheme for free while others can avail the benefits with 50% cost of insurance premium.
